original: Reinforce positive playtime, family values and
translated: 购买性别角色娃娃，增加有益的娱乐时间

original: gender roles with the Gender Role Doll.
translated: 强化家庭观念和性别角色。

original: The Gender Role Doll provides an enjoyable way for your sons and daughters to learn about what it means to be part of a healthy, traditional family unit: a meek, submissive wife and an aggressive, dominant husband trapped in a joyless marriage who have awkward sex once a month in the missionary position and suppress all their true emotions for fear of offending an all-seeing celestial being.
translated: 性别角色娃娃寓教于乐，让你的子女了解健康的传统家庭的真谛：懦弱、顺从的妻子和强势、霸道的丈夫，两人共度毫无乐趣的婚姻，每个月用传教士体位进行一次机械的性爱，担心冒犯到无所不知的天主，因此压抑着自己的真实情感。

original: LIBERTY CITY DEPUTY MAYOR, BRYCE DAWKINS

"I endorse the Gender Role Doll whole-heartedly.  We must protect our children from the gender-bending depravity that is turning our young men and women into a nation of androgynous, tattooed namby-pampies with metal spikes through their genitals.  Terrorists never dared to attack our shores before.
translated: 「我坚决支持性别角色娃娃。我们必须保护孩子，让他们远离那种扭曲性别的堕落生活，变得男不男女不女、全身纹身、优柔寡断，往生殖器上打钉子。先前从未有胆敢袭击我国海岸的恐怖分子。

original: Now they see us as weak.
translated: 现在他们当我们是弱鸡。

original: A futile battle of the sexes over the past few decades has allowed degenerate behavior and immorality to thrive.  Everywhere they look, our children are surrounded by men with shaved legs and women with strap-on penises. This is what happens when you try to deny nature. These days being pro-family is seen as something shameful but I know how I live my life and I know how I want my children to live theirs. It's time that we started raising proud little Americans again."
translated: 过去几十年的两性之争徒劳无功，反而让堕落的行为道德发展壮大。目所能及之处，孩子们已经被剃光腿毛的男人和绑着假阴茎的女人包围了。这就是否定天性的后果。当今社会，支持传统家庭反倒成了一件难以启齿的事情，但我知道自己是怎么活的，也想让孩子过上正常的生活。是时候再次让小美国人健康成长了。」
